RTCPeerConnectionRemoveTrack.summary:
The removeTrack() method of the interface tells the local end of the connection to stop sending media from the specified track, without actually removing the corresponding from the list of senders as reported by .
If the track is already stopped, or is not in the connection's senders list, this method has no effect.

remarks.para:
If the connection has already been negotiated ( is set to "stable"), it is marked as needing to be negotiated again; the remote peer won't experience the change until this negotiation occurs.
A event is sent to the to let the local end know this negotiation must occur.
